update project_big_scheduling_details set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_no = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, big_sort = #{bigSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, big_name = #{bigName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rename_big = #{renameBig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_start_time = #{planStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plan_end_time = #{planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_start_time = #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_end_time = #{actualEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_matching = #{isMatching,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_completed = #{isCompleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_add = #{isAdd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_change = #{isChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_num = #{submitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_need_check = #{isNeedCheck,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_adopt = #{isAdopt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM project_big_scheduling_details WHERE project_no = #{projectNo} AND status = #{status}

select p.stage AS stage, b.big_name AS constructionProject, b.plan_satrt_time AS planSatrtTime, b.plan_end_time AS planEndTime, b.actual_satrt_time AS actualSatrtTime, b.actual_end_time actualEndTime FROM project_big_scheduling_details b,project p WHERE b.project_no=#{constructionPlanVO.projectNo} AND b.status=#{constructionPlanVO.status} AND p.project_no = b.project_no ORDER BY b.create_time DESC
limit #{pageSize} offset #{pageNum}
select count(1) FROM project_big_scheduling_details b LEFT JOIN project p ON b.project_no = b.project_no WHERE b.project_no=#{constructionPlanVO.projectNo} AND b.status=#{constructionPlanVO.status}

SELECT b.big_name AS acceptancePhase FROM project_big_scheduling_details b WHERE b.project_no=#{projectNo} ORDER BY b.create_time DESC
limit #{pageSize} offset #{pageNum}
SELECT count(1) FROM project_big_scheduling_details b WHERE b.project_no=#{projectNo}
SELECT pd.rename_big FROM project_big_scheduling_details pd LEFT JOIN construction_order co ON pd.project_no = co.project_no WHERE co.order_no = #{orderNo}
SELECT pd.rename_big FROM project_big_scheduling_details pd LEFT JOIN designer_order co ON pd.project_no = co.project_no WHERE co.order_no = #{orderNo}
